episodes.title: How This ‘Christian’ Cult Manipulated Thousands | Children of God Breakdown
episodes.description:
In this video, we take a deep dive into the history of The Children of God. A religious movement that began in the late 1960s. Led by David Berg, this group preached a message of spiritual freedom, love, and salvation, but it reportedly evolved into a tightly controlled network.

This video is part of my new ongoing Cult Breakdown Multi Minute Series, where I unpack the history, beliefs, and alleged actions of infamous organizations and movements in just a few minutes.

episodes.title: Meditation Guru Is Secretly A Cult Leader
episodes.description:
In this video, we delve into the intriguing and controversial story of Zen Master Rama and the spiritual movement that he led starting in the 1980s. Zen Master Rama, also known as Dr. Frederick Lenz, was a complex figure who garnered both followers and critics during his lifetime. He later drowned himself in an apparent suicide, in protest of how spiritual leaders are treated in the United States.￼

This video explores the history, beliefs, and It delves into the allegations of it being described as a cult, examining the experiences of former members.

Please be aware that the content of this video is intended for informational and educational purposes.
